name: Cobra Bubbles
title: Simple Educator
flavour: So if I understand correctly, your “magic” grimoire was washed away by a flood of “magic” ink?

name: Grand Duke
title: King's Advisor
action: <mark>YES, YOUR MAJESTY</mark> Your Princess, Prince, Queen and King characters gain +1 ※.
flavour: He could be the king of the stubborn.

name: Mickey Mouse
title: Friendly Face
action: <mark>GLAD YOU’RE HERE!</mark> Whenever this character quests, you pay 3 ⬡ less for the next character you play this turn.
flavour: “Come on in−there’s lots to explore.”

name: Mulan
title: Reflecting
action:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Mulan.)
HONOR TO THE ANCESTORS Whenever this character quests, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a song card, you may play it for free. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

name: The Queen
title: Commanding Presence
action:
Shift 2 You may pay 2 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named The Queen.)
WHO IS THE FAIREST? Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -4 ※ this turn and chosen character gets +4 ※ this turn.

name: Last Stand
action: Banish chosen character who was challenged this turn.
flavour:
“Let’s finish this, binturi.”
–Namaari

name: Zero To Hero
action:
A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Count the number of characters you have in play. You pay that amount of ⬡ less for the next character you play this turn.

name: Arthur
title: Enchanter's Apprentice
action: <mark>STUDENT</mark> When this character is sent to quest, you can return one of your other characters to your hand to gain 2 Lore.
flavour: “Hmm ... what spell should I try next?”

name: Chip
title: Innocent Soul
flavour: “Wanna see me do a trick?”

name: Elsa
title: Gloves Off
action: Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3 ※)
flavour: The power of ice may not stop the flood, but it will help protect Lorcana.

name: Madam Mim
title: Fox
action:
CHASING THE RABBIT When you play this character, banish her or return another chosen character of yours to your hand.
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they’re played.)

name: Madam Mim
title: Purple Dragon
action:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
I WIN, I WIN! When you play this character, banish her or return another 2 chosen characters of yours to your hand.
flavour: “Did I say no purple dragons? Did I?”

name: Madam Mim
title: Snake
action: <mark>JUST YOU WAIT</mark> When you play this character, banish her or return another chosen character of yours to your hand.
flavour: “I’ve got you rattled now!”

name: Merlin
title: Crab
action: READY OR NOT! When you play this character and when he leaves play, chosen character gains Challenger +3 this turn. (They get +3 ※ while challenging.)
flavour: He’ll be out of this in a snap!

name: Merlin
title: Goat
action: <mark>HERE I COME!</mark> When you play this character and when he leaves play, gain 1 lore.
flavour:
“He always was a stubborn old goat.”
–Madam Mim

name: Merlin
title: Rabbit
action: <mark>HOPPITY HIP!</mark> When you play this character and when he leaves play, you may draw a card.
flavour: It was turning out to be a bad hare day.

name: Merlin
title: Shapeshifter
action: <mark>BATTLE OF WITS</mark> Whenever one of your other characters is returned to your hand from play, this character gets +1 ◆ this turn.
flavour: “Oh, blast it all−I can’t make up my mind.”

name: Merlin
title: Squirrel
action: <mark>LOOK BEFORE YOU LEAP</mark> When you play this character and when he leaves play, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.
flavour: “You can’t always trust to luck, boy.”

name: Pinocchio
title: Star Attraction
flavour:
“With that personality, that profile, that physique . . . 
Why, I can see your name in lights, lights six feet high.” 
−Honest John

name: Winnie The Pooh
title: Hunny Wizard
flavour: He’d always felt a kinship with honey. They were both golden, and sweet, and likely to end up in sticky situations.

name: I'm Stuck!
action: Chosen exerted character can't ready at the start of their next turn.
flavour: “Oh, bother−not again.”

name: Confusing Signs
action: <mark>TO WONDERLAND</mark> Banish this Item – Return chosen character of yours to your hand.
flavour:
Alice: “I just wanted to ask you which way I ought to go.” 
Cheshire Cat: “Well, that depends on where you want to get to.”

name: The Sorcerer's Spellbook
action: <mark>KNOWLEDGE</mark> ↷, 1 ⬡ − Gain 1 lore.
flavour: Illumineers seek the power of knowledge−but must be aware of the price.

name: Beast
title: Relentless
action: <mark>SECOND WIND</mark> Whenever an opposing character is damaged, you may ready this character.

name: Belle
title: Bookworm
action: <mark>USE YOUR IMAGINATION</mark> While an opponent has no cards in their hand, this character gets +2 ◆.
flavour: There's nothing more tempting than a pile of unread books.

name: Belle
title: Hidden Archer
action:
Shift 3 You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Belle.)
THORNY ARROWS Whenever this character is challenged, the challenging character’s player discards all cards in their hand.
flavour: She slips through the trees as easily as shadow.

name: Bucky
title: Squirrel Squeak Tutor
action: Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.) SQUEAK Whenever you play a Floodborn character, each opponent chooses and discards a card.
flavour:
“There’s a lot of nuance to squirrel.”

name: Daisy Duck
title: Secret Agent
action: <mark>THWART</mark> Whenever this character quests, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

name: Enchantress
title: Unexpected Judge
action: <mark>TRUE APPEARANCE</mark> Whenever this character is challenged, this character gets +2 ※.
flavour: Appearances can be deceiving.

name: Flynn Rider
title: Confident Vagabond
flavour: “I love a good fan club, but they could at least try to get the nose right!”

name: Lucifer
title: Sneaky Cat
action: <mark>MOUSE HUNTER</mark> When you play this character, each opponent chooses and discards 2 cards or 1 action card.
flavour:
“He can’t be anything but mean and hypocritical.” 
–Cinderella

name: Panic
title: Underworld Imp
action: <mark>I CAN HANDLE IT</mark> When you play this character, chosen character gets +2 ※ this turn. If the chosen character is named Pain, he gets +4 ※ instead.
flavour:
“Who says it's hard to find good help these days? 
Oh, yeah . . . ME!” 
−Hades

name: Prince John
title: The Greediest of All
action:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
I CONDEMN YOU Every time your opponent discards at least one card, you can draw that many cards.
flavour: “Taxes ! Taxes ! Magnificant taxes !”

name: Queen Of Hearts
title: Quick-Tempered
action: <mark>ROYALE RAGE</mark> When you play this character, deal 1 damage to chosen damaged opposing character.
flavour:
“You know, we could make her really angry. Shall we try?”  
−Cheshire Cat

name: Bibbidi Bobbidi Boo
action:

action: Return chosen character of yours to your hand to return another chosen character to their player's hand.
flavour:
“Are you ready for some bouncing?”
−Tigger

name: Hypnotize
action: Each opponent chooses and discards a card. Draw a card.
flavour: “Look me in the eye when I’m speaking to you.”

name: Improvise
action: Chosen character gets +1 ※ this turn. Draw a card.
flavour:
Shan-Yu: “It looks like you’re out of ideas.” 
Mulan: “Not quite!”

name: Ring The Bell
action: Banish chosen damaged character.
flavour:
“I’m afraid that you’ve gone and upset me.“ 
– Ratigan

name: Lady Tremaine
title: Arrogant Matriarch
action: <mark>NOT FOR YOU</mark> When you play this character, all opponents with more lore than you lose 1 lore.
flavour: “Believe me, this time I will keep the key theft-proof.”

name: Lumiere
title: Real Hothead
flavour: When the situation heats up, no one is hotter than him.

name: Minnie Mouse
title: Wide-Eyed Diver
action:
Shift 2 You may pay 2 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Minnie Mouse.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
UNDERSEA ADVENTURE Whenever you play a second action in a turn, this character gets +2 ◆ this turn.

name: Minnie Mouse
title: Zipping Around
flavour: Zero to fun in under three seconds!

name: Mulan
title: Soldier in Training
action: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
flavour: “I have to do something!”

name: Raya
title: Warrior of Kumandra

title: Vicious Cheater
action:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they’re played.)
DADDY ISN’T HERE TO SAVE YOU Whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may ready this character. This character can’t quest for the rest of this turn.

title: One of a Kind
action: <mark>ENERGETIC</mark> Whenever you play an action, this character gets +2 ※ this turn.
flavour: Bouncing in to save the day!

name: Dinner Bell
action: <mark>YOU KNOW WHAT HAPPENS</mark> ↷, 2 ⬡ − Draw cards equal to the damage on chosen character of yours, then banish them.
flavour: The delicate sound of impending doom.

name: Sword In The Anvil
action: ↷, 2 ⬡ - Chosen character gains +1 ※ for each Damage token on him until the end of this turn.
flavour: “He who can snatch this sword from the anvil sealed in stone will be worthy to be king, sovereign master of England.”

name: Basil
title: Great Mouse Detective
action:
Shift 5 You may pay 5 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Basil.)
THERE'S ALWAYS A CHANCE If you used Shift to play this character, you may draw 2 cards when he enters play.
flavour: A solution always presents itself.

name: Basil
title: Of Baker Street
action: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character‘s ※ this turn.)

name: Basil
title: Perceptive Investigator

title: Housekeeper

flavour: “I know just the thing. Let me fetch you a pot of tea and some of my fresh cheese crumpets.“

name: Prince Charming
title: Heir to the Throne
flavour: He searched across the Inklands for the young woman who stole his heart at the ball, but only found more mysteries.

action:
CAREFUL AIM ↷, 2 ⬡ – Chosen character gets -2 ※ this turn.
STAY BACK! ↷, Banish this item – Banish chosen Dragon character.

name: Prince Naveen

flavour: All he has, is his charm.

name: Queen of Hearts
